title: Murder in the Void
description: A shocking incident has occurred aboard the orbital research station Prometheus-7. With Earth hundreds of miles below, the crew must solve this mystery before their next supply mission arrives.

suspects.name: Commander Torres
suspects.description: A seasoned space veteran with 15 years of command experience. Known for her strict adherence to protocols and protective nature toward her crew.

suspects.name: Dr. Chen
suspects.description: The station's chief medical officer and xenobiologist. Brilliant but secretive, she often works late shifts in the research labs.

suspects.name: Engineer Rodriguez
suspects.description: The station's maintenance specialist who keeps all systems running smoothly. Has an easy-going personality but takes equipment safety very seriously.

weapons.name: Plasma Cutter
weapons.description: A powerful industrial tool used for cutting through metal hull plates during repairs.

weapons.name: Pressure Wrench
weapons.description: A specialized wrench designed for high-pressure valve maintenance in zero gravity.

weapons.name: Emergency Beacon
weapons.description: A compact communication device used to signal distress calls to Earth.

locations.name: Command Bridge
locations.description: The nerve center of the station with navigation controls and communication arrays.

locations.name: Engineering Bay
locations.description: The technical heart of the station filled with life support systems and repair equipment.

locations.name: Observation Deck
locations.description: A panoramic viewing area with massive windows offering stunning views of Earth and space.

clues: The shortest suspect was spotted near the command bridge during the incident
Heavy industrial tools are strictly prohibited on the command bridge for safety reasons
Someone with green eyes left clear fingerprints on the emergency beacon
The observation deck was undergoing window maintenance, making it inaccessible during the incident
A right-handed person was seen leaving the command bridge in a hurry
Security footage shows the engineering bay was occupied by someone tall throughout the evening

statements.speaker: Commander Torres
statements.statement: I brought the plasma cutter to the engineering bay for hull repairs

statements.speaker: Dr. Chen
statements.statement: I was running diagnostics on the observation deck's atmospheric systems

statements.speaker: Engineer Rodriguez
statements.statement: I saw Commander Torres working in the engineering bay all evening
